title: Au Small Finance Bank Announces 1:1 Bonus Issue, Q4 Profit More Than Doubles | Mint - Mint
content:
1. Au Small Finance Bank Announces 1:1 Bonus Issue, Q4 Profit More Than Doubles | Mint  Mint
  2. AU Small Finance Bank Q4 net doubles to Rs 346 cr on better margins  Business Standard
  3. AU Small Finance Bank offers 1:1 bonus shares, 10% dividend to shareholders  Economic Times
  4. Au Small Finance Bank Net Soars 105% To Rs 346 Cr In Q4  CNBCTV18
  5. AU Small Finance Bank Q4 net doubles to Rs 346 crore  Moneycontrol
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The Board has also considered and approved increase in authorised capital from  ₹350 crores to  ₹1,200 crore, and recommended a dividend of  ₹1 per share
